meanings.definition: The quality or state of being attractive.
meanings.sent1: Her smile had a certain attractancy that drew people in.
meanings.sent2: The attractancy of the new car model made it a bestseller.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics added to its attractancy.
meanings.sent4: The attractancy of the garden was like a magnet for butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The attractancy of the glittering stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The ability to attract or draw in.
meanings.sent1: The attractancy of the magnet pulled the metal objects towards it.
meanings.sent2: The attractancy of the advertisement led to an increase in sales.
meanings.sent3: The attractancy of the vacuum cleaner amused the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: The attractancy of the black hole in space was like a cosmic vacuum.
meanings.sent5: The attractancy of the strong scent attracted bees from afar.
